subject: Coaches and Managers
College Athletics
Basketball
lead_paragraph: A self-made coach who has worked in Divisions I, II and III, Kim Barnes Arico, 39, has St. John’s off to a 16-3 start going into Wednesday’s game at Syracuse.
snippet: A self-made coach who has worked in Divisions I, II and III, Kim Barnes Arico, 39, has St. John’s off to a 16-3 start going into Wednesday’s game at Syracuse.
